page.title: 18CHILD'S DAY IN BENINGTON (3)
page.content: 15.30 hr.My Aunt, Uncle, and three Cousins called. I showed my youngest Cousin, Natalie, how to clean out my pet Mouse (Jasper). 16.00 hr.Uncle & Aunt and Family took my Sister, Vanessa, to Gymnastics. We got ready to go out. I had a Shower and Brushed my Teeth. 17.30 hr.We left our House, driven by Dad in Ford Escort. We went to my Uncle & Aunt's House, picked up Vanessa, and drove on to other Relatives at Old Wel- wyn. 18.00 hr.Arrived at Old Welwyn and had Tea: Choice of Salad from, Ham,Lettuce, Tomatoes, Cucumber, Coleslaw, Pickled Onions, Eggs and Salad Dressing, with Bread & Butter and followed by Trifle or Cakes. We had Tea to drink. We then all went for a walk round the back of the house for about twenty minutes. (Cont.)
